summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 FOREST RIVER RECREATIONAL VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE HAS A DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR, MODEL RM2652.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS A LEAK IN THE REFRIGERATOR.  THE FAILURE DESCRIBED IN THE RECALL FOR THE DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR HAD OCCURRED IN HIS UNIT.  THE RECALL REPAIR HAS NOT YET BEEN PERFORMED.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE NEVER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE.  THE NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER AND PART NUMBER WERE UNKNOWN.
